name: RTotal
description: RTotal is very simple to use, secure and complete solution that educational institute can implement. Seamlessly connect in constructive and controlled manner the stakeholders like Parents, Teachers, Principal, Accounts, Vendors and Management. Make the operations processes-centric rather than resource-centric.  The RTotal Apps are designed intelligently, for ease of use and flexibility, keeping in mind the requirements of the Educational Institution and Parents. It helps both the Institution and the parents to have seamless connect and access to information Anytime, Anywhere, thus enabling better connect and informed decision making.  The functionality spans across varied nature of communication and allows the schools to smartly keep Parents informed about ,Examination schedules, Progress report, Attendance, Homework, Fees, Notices, Events, Timetable, etc. on a real time basis of their ward.   When asked for, users need to obtain the security code from the institution where ward is enrolled in.
